posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 搭建个人博客
posts.text: 开始使用安装nodejs参考nodejs官网 安装git参考git官网 安装hexo1npm install hexo -g 新建一个文件夹用来存放项目1hexo init 修改配置文件_config.yml 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485# Hexo Configuration## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.html## Source: https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/# Sitetitle: MyBlog #站点名称subtitle: sub #子标题description: blog #描述keywords: - blog - keywordsauthor: 王 #作者language: zh-CN #语言 timezone: #时区# URL## If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as 'http://yoursite.com/child' and root as '/child/'url: http://wmgselfblog.github.io #域名root: / #根路径permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/permalink_defaults:# Directorysource_dir: sourcepublic_dir: publictag_dir: tagsarchive_dir: archivescategory_dir: categoriescode_dir: downloads/codei18n_dir: :langskip_render:# Writingnew_post_name: :title.md # File name of new postsdefault_layout: posttitlecase: false # Transform title into titlecaseexternal_link: true # Open external links in new tabfilename_case: 0render_drafts: falsepost_asset_folder: falserelative_link: falsefuture: truehighlight: enable: true line_number: true auto_detect: false tab_replace: # Home page setting# path: Root path for your blogs index page. (default = '')# per_page: Posts displayed per page. (0 = disable pagination)# order_by: Posts order. (Order by date descending by default)index_generator: path: '' per_page: 10 order_by: -date # Category & Tagdefault_category: uncategorizedcategory_map:tag_map:# Date / Time format## Hexo uses Moment.js to parse and display date## You can customize the date format as defined in## http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/date_format: YYYY-MM-DDtime_format: HH:mm:ss# Pagination## Set per_page to 0 to disable paginationper_page: 10pagination_dir: page# Extensions## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/theme: material-flow# Deployment## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.htmldeploy: #设置自动上传github type: git repo: https://github.com/wmgselfblog/wmgselfblog.github.io.git branch: master 启动123hexo cleanhexo ghexo s 发布到github···hexo d··· 进阶安装主题 更改为工作目录cd / your_blog_dir /安装依赖关系npm i -S hexo-generator-search hexo-generator-feed hexo-renderer-less hexo-autoprefixer hexo-generator-json-content下载源git clone https://github.com/stkevintan/hexo-theme-material-flow themes / material-flow 修改_config.yml将主题换为 theme: material-flow 重新发布1234hexo cleanhexo ghexo d(发布到配置好的deploy)hexo s（本地发布）
